thread.title_full: Very good hotel near O2 - Review of Holiday Inn Express London-Limehouse, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Taxilady1
title: Very good hotel near O2
text:
The hotel is tidy and the beds are good and firm. The bathroom has an unique solution as the bathroom door doubles as the toilet door and the bathroom door. Brilliant!
The breakfast was english. Nothing special.
The best free wi-fi in town?
Room Tip: The room facing the back yard were really quiet. See more room tips
